{{notability|date=September 2011}} {{primary sources|date=September 2011}} {{Infobox software | name = SLiM | screenshot = [[Image:Slim01.jpg|200px]] | caption = Default SLiM theme | developers = Simone Rota and Johannes Winkelmann | latest_release_version = 1.3.2 | latest_release_date = {{release date|2010|07|07}} | operating_system = [[Unix-like]] | genre = [[X display manager (program type)|X display manager]] | license = [[GNU General Public License|GPL v2]] | website = [http://slim.berlios.de slim.berlios.de]| }} '''SLiM''' (Simple Login Manager) is a desktop-independent graphical login manager for the [[X Window System]]. SLiM aims to be light, completely configurable, and suitable for machines on which remote login functionalities are not needed.
== Features == SLiM supports the following features: * [[Portable Network Graphics|PNG]] and [[XFT]] support for alpha transparency and anti-aliased fonts * External themes support * Configurable runtime options: X server, login / shutdown / reboot commands * Single ([[GNOME Display Manager|GDM]]-like) or double ([[X Display Manager (implementation)|XDM]]-like) input control * Can load predefined user at startup * Configurable welcome / shutdown messages * Random theme selection
== Requirements == SLiM has the following requirements: * X11 * libpng * libjpeg * freetype
